chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hola hello, are you ready to begin? listo para empezar el juego?
¡hola! absolutely ready! i'm starting at the point near the twig that leads to the tiger's island
¿dónde voy ahora?
ok so you want to start at the twig on tiger island, from their you can go west to the parrot island cross between the parrot and the elephant from north to south.
cruzar a la isla de los pájaros e ir de norte a sur entre los pájaros y los elefantes
alright! so i've made my way from the tiger to the parrot, and then onto the elephant
¿y ahora qué?
ok amigo, he cruzado a la isla de los pájaros y he ido de norte a sur entre ellos y los elefantes
ahora estoy al lado del elefante. ¿qué sigue?
ok bueno! now cross the rock path south east of the bird onto the frog island. sureste de la isla de los pájaros a la isla de las ranas!
got it! now i'm chilling with the frog on its island
¿hacia dónde me dirijo a continuación?
now you want to go west and cross through the crocodile waters , pass over the edge of the elephant island, and cross over the rocks from elephant island to giraffe island.
hecho! pasé por las aguas del cocodrilo, bordeé la isla del elefante y me he movido por las rocas hasta la girrafa
ahora estoy con la girafa. ¿cuál es el próximo paso?
excelente! now all you do is go south through the path to snake island, past the snake trees and boom you got the treasure!
¡excelente! pasé por la isla de la serpiente, más allá de los árboles de serpientes y ¡boom! tengo el tesoro
*finished*
hola, you ready?
hola! si amigo I'm ready! We are starting at the dog near the bench, adonde voy?
bueno, from the dog, just stroll a bit to the left, up to that trail heading to the florist stand
but don't reach the florist stand, once there, dodge it by making a 180-degree turn – we're headed back to our furry friend!
Ok im near the bench again, hacia donde vamos?
alright cool, now cross over the bench and go south, all the way down till you see another white dog next to a picnic setup
pretty cute, eh?
PERROS ADORABLES!!! ok Im there, where to next mi amigo? We having a picnic?
haha, not today
now march over the mat, make sure you touch those berries. after that, we're heading west, my friend!
ok I stopped to come algunas bayas! Now I'm full and ready to move on
awesome! now, we're heading towards another wooden branch
we're gonna cross this river one more time, this time northwards. adventure time!
The river has been crossed again, I see the flower stand and a bicycler on a bridge now
great job! now sneak past that bush without touching it, circle it from the right side, and head on to the florist stand
we're almost there!
ok made it to florist stand my friend!
amazing! now, let's make a little turn to the left, and go below that stand till you reach the big bridge with those two people riding a bicycle
let's not disturb them, though, just pass them from the west side
Alright, people riding bikes are passed, I am near the edge of the bridge
nice, now after crossing the bridge, you'll see two elderly folks on a bench, chilling with their newspapers
let's move a bit to the south of them
done, I see a deer coming up
perfecto! now just between that wooden branch near you and a green bush, move eastward till you reach a young deer
this is the final step. you made it, compadre!
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hello! I am your virtual map uber driver tonight, are you ready to take our trip?
haha, love it! i'm at the tent in the north
where to next, map maestro?
Ok so first you're going to want to curve down southwest on the west side of that cute doggo until you get on the path on the opposite side, or south side, of the dog
got it! walking past the pup now, heading southwest
ready for the next move, amigo!
stay on the path for a bit, when you see a campfire, move north east and circle around the north side of the campfire without touching it. FIRE IS HOT.
totally agree, fire is hot! i'm circling the campfire from the north, then
done! what's next, captain?
Cross between the east side of the camp fire  and the west side of the mushrooms and go take a look at that gorgeous new blue car.
i'm passing between the campfire and the mushroom and ohh, there's a cool blue car!
yeah but only look at it, don't drive it. I don't think you have a license do you? Return to the path and follow it south until you see a telescope.
haha! right, no driving today
now, i'm following the path south and, look, i see the telescope! what's next, buddy?
ok so you're going to want to go between the east side of the telescope and the west side of that large bush next to it. Cross south between those two until you hit the path again.
got it, i'm going south between the telescope and the bush until i hit the path again
what's the next step, friend-o?
we're almost there. Just follow the path until you find the rocks leading up to the cabin. Climb the rocks from the east side of the cabin. From your view you're heading west towards it.
heading west now, climbing the rocks from the east side of the cabin
Once you climb the rocks sit on the east side of the cabin's porch and enjoy your vacation!
aww yeah! enjoying the east side of the cabin's porch
we made it! *finished* you're the best, dude
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hello my friend, I'm ready when you are
awesome! now you're at the three palm trees, right? so go under the first palm tree toward the south-west
then make a right, past the second palm tree, and quickly swing left just before the third one. keep going south
You're right, I am at the three palm trees! I'm going south west of the palm tree now, and circling around the 2nd palm tree
perfect! now, you're gonna come across a cute little brown puppy
go to its left and hit the south by making a slight left and then a right turn. you're doing great!
ok I'm at the rock at the south side of the puppy
great! now, hug the left edge of that rock and head towards the water
see the big rock on your left and the small one on your right? go right through the middle!
ok going through the middle, I see a HUGE crab what should I do?
ha-ha, don't sweat it!just turn west and for a bit, we're gonna waddle along the rock in water
isn't this crab awesome?
He is indeed! Now I've passed the crab and headed west
awesome! keep going until you spot a medium rock. you're gonna pass that one too
after that, you'll see a shark but no need to panic, just turn right. you're doing incredibly well!
Oh boy, I turned right just in time to avoid that shark!
striking moves! okay, now we're heading back to land, crossing between the medium rock and a multicolored ball
go north, alright?
you got it friend, I'm headed north between the ball and medium rock
great job! up next, make a slight left and keep going north-west
can you see a red tent and a speaker? perfect, go between them!
I'm between the tent and the speaker, they're playing some good tunes over here!
ha-ha, don't get too carried away! now, circle around the tent, looks fun, right?
Tent is circled!
perfect! now, let's head towards the sea, but stop when you're at the shore
can you spot a red kayak?
I've stopped before shore and seen a red kayak to the west, should I go for it?
that's right! head west, right below that bright red kayak
but careful, don't flip it!
I'm now below it! Any more instructions?
yes! turn 90 degrees right, follow the kayak until you spot a small green bush
I'm west of the kayak and in view of that bush
you did it, mate! that green bush is our goal! well done!
Hey awesome thanks buddy!
was a pleasure guiding you through! you did fantastic!

general_survey.answer: The partner did initially switch languages but seemed like it eventually preferred English over Spanish. Maybe it was a reflection of my language use.
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: I took 3 years of spanish in highschool. Not a master of it, but I always get by con un poco
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your language background?
